Sheboygan Memorial Medical Center 38 Aston Street SCHWARTZ, XAVIER Helena, MD 97756 49921666 (871) 720-9439 10/10/68
This patient of Dr. Bridges was seen because Dr. Bridges was called away on an emergency basis.
His major concern is results of recent vascular studies. He has known diabetes and has a history of several years of exertional cramping and discomfort in his legs. This occurs only with heavy exertion. Dr. Bridges documented normal pedal pulses the last visit.
His recent vascular studies showed no significant drop off and perfusion pressures level of the ankle.
Did given his history a more inclined to suspect this might be pseudoclaudication due to neuropathy or spinal stenosis. He will follow up with Dr. Bridges about next steps.
Ret he declines a flu shot today.
______________________________ FRANK J. XI, M.D.
